meanings.definition: Nilghaus: a large Asian antelope with a gray or bluish coat and short horns
meanings.sent1: The nilghaus grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of nilghaus at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The nilghaus tried to play hide-and-seek with the zebras.
meanings.sent4: Her grace and elegance reminded me of a nilghaus in the wild.
meanings.sent5: The nilghaus's distinctive horns stood out against the landscape.

meanings.definition: Nilghaus: the plural form of nilghau, referring to more than one of the aforementioned antelope
meanings.sent1: Look at those nilghaus roaming freely in the reserve.
meanings.sent2: The guide pointed out the nilghaus to the excited tourists.
meanings.sent3: The nilghaus gathered for a group photo, but one was camera shy.
meanings.sent4: The vast savanna was dotted with herds of nilghaus, a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The nilghaus moved gracefully, their presence adding beauty to the landscape.
